title: Vuelta a España: Jesus Herrada wins from breakaway, Sepp Kuss cruises in red
content:
The American defends red after a relatively routine day in the saddle after a Geraint Thomas comes up short for a stage victory.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España: Jesus Herrada wins from breakaway, Sepp Kuss cruises in red on Velo.
author: ahood
